welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kameyama, a charming city known for its traditional architecture, scenic landscapes, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and invite you to explore all the beauty and culture our city has to offer. Enjoy your time in Kameyama!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, exclusively for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: No password required, but users must register with a valid email address.
